comments.body: In v2, we typically use `namespace` instead of `database` because `database` is a single identifier in the rest of the codebase.

comments.body: The reason why we have `isTemporary` before is: `SHOW TABLES` will list temp views in the current session as well. If we are not going to list temp views in the v2 `SHOW TABLES`, I'd like to remove this column.

comments.body: I think it should be a string formatted using `quoted`. Otherwise, it will be difficult for users to copy & paste the output to query tables.
